auth.welcome_desc: Enter your email to sign in to your account
auth.create_desc: Join the community to start building
auth.demo_mode: Demo mode â€” Supabase not configured
auth.password_min: Password must be at least 6 characters

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Fast access to sessions, assignments, and operations.

judge.title: Judge Dashboard
judge.subtitle: Your assigned projects for review
judge.ai_desc: Use the scoring rubric to ensure fair and consistent evaluation of all projects.
judge.ai_copilot_tip: Click "Start Review" to access the detailed scoring interface.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your preferences and integrations.
settings.ai_desc: Configure the OpenAI-compatible provider for judging and content generation.
settings.ai_compatible_desc: Compatible with OpenAI, DeepSeek, SiliconFlow, or local LLMs (e.g. Ollama).
settings.saved_desc: Settings will be used for all AI features in this browser.
settings.gitbook_url_desc: Embed a GitBook page on the Docs tab for event details.
settings.cover_gradient_desc: Choose a gradient theme for your hackathon cover.
settings.notifications_desc: Configure email and in-app notifications for your hackathon.
settings.notifications_coming_soon_desc: Notify judges of new assignments, remind participants of deadlines, and send automated updates.
settings.integrations_desc: Connect third-party tools to enhance your hackathon.
settings.integrations_coming_soon_desc: Auto-import projects from GitHub repos, send notifications to Slack channels, and more.
settings.account_security_desc: Manage your profile and session settings.
settings.ai_copilot_desc: AI-powered tools to enhance the hackathon experience.
settings.ai_copilot_coming_soon: AI-assisted scoring and project summarization coming soon
settings.ai_copilot_coming_soon_desc: Auto-generate project summaries, suggest scores based on criteria, and detect scoring anomalies.
settings.judge_management_desc: Create and manage judge accounts for your hackathons.
settings.no_judges: No judges yet. Click "Add Judge" to create one.
settings.judge_delete_confirm: Delete judge "{{name}}"? This will also remove all their assignments.

hackathons.title: Hackathons
hackathons.more_desc: Browse past and upcoming events, access project lists, judging, and operations.
hackathons.prize_pool_desc: Enter the total prize amount or rewards description. Leave empty to hide.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Manage and review project submissions.
projects.read_only_score: Scoring is closed or you do not have permission to judge this project.
projects.delete_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the project "{{title}}" and remove all associated data.

judging.title: Judging
judging.subtitle: Assignments are session-scoped and judge-scoped for confidentiality.
judging.score_criteria_desc: Rate the project based on the criteria below

assignments.title: Project Assignments
assignments.subtitle: Assign projects to judges for evaluation
assignments.help: Check the boxes to assign projects to judges. Each project can be assigned to multiple judges.
assignments.projects_desc: Select projects to assign to judges
assignments.judges_desc: View judge assignments and assign all projects
assignments.click_to_add: Click projects above to add them to the leaderboard

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.subtitle: Live rankings based on judge scores.
leaderboard.empty_hint: Click projects above to add them to the leaderboard
leaderboard.not_published_yet: Leaderboard has not been published yet

reports.title: Scoring Report
reports.subtitle: View detailed scoring data and download reports
reports.scoring_matrix_desc: Detailed breakdown of scores by project and judge

gitbook.title: Event Details
gitbook.no_docs_desc: The organizer has not configured event documentation. Documentation can be created on GitBook and linked in the hackathon settings.
gitbook.embed_blocked: This documentation site cannot be embedded.
